table.sql:
MAL.owner IN #owner[]# AND (MAL.DELETE_FLAG != 'T' OR MAL.DELETE_FLAG is null)
query not allowed
MAL.TRANS_AMOUNT > 0
MAL.TRANS_AMOUNT < 0
MAL.IW_ACCOUNT_LOG_ID = #iwAccountLogId#
MAL.real_trade_no in
#tradeNos[]#
MAL.trans_account = #accountNo#
MAL.other_account = #otherAccountNo#
MAL.trans_code IN
#transCodes[]#
MAL.trans_code NOT IN
#excludeTransCodes[]#
MAL.sub_trans_code IN
#subTransCodes[]#
MAL.trans_dt >= #transDtBegin#
MAL.trans_dt < #transDtEnd#
abs(MAL.TRANS_AMOUNT) >= #minTransAmount#
abs(MAL.TRANS_AMOUNT) <= #maxTransAmount#
MAL.bank_name = #bankName#
MAL.trans_memo like #transMemo#
MAL.trans_out_order_no = #transOutOrderNo#
MAL.VAR2 = #outTradeNo#
and sub_trans_code != '301118'
and BTB.trade_email IN
#partnerIds[]#

operation.name: findAccountLogWithAirExtWithCreditpay
operation.remarks: 帐务明细查询(增加信用支付)
operation.sql:
SELECT IW_ACCOUNT_LOG_ID,TRANS_LOG_ID,MAL.TRANS_DATE,MAL.OUT_DATE,MAL.TRANS_DT,MAL.TRANS_CODE,MAL.TRANS_AMOUNT,MAL.BALANCE,MAL.TRANS_CURRENCY,MAL.ACCOUNT_TYPE,MAL.TRANS_ACCOUNT,OTHER_ACCOUNT_TYPE,OTHER_ACCOUNT,TRANS_INSTITUTION,TRANS_OUT_ORDER_NO,BANK_NAME,TRANS_MEMO,SUB_TRANS_CODE,OUT_BIZ_NO,MODEL,SUITE_ID,IS_WRITE_OFF,IS_RED,OTHER_ACCOUNT_LOG,DELETE_FLAG,VOUCHER_ID,ORGI_VOUCHER_ID,TRANS_OPERATOR,INST_CHANNEL_API,REAL_TRADE_NO,PAY_TYPE,MAL.VAR2 specialOutTradeNo, , MAE.PNR,MAE.TICKET_NO_START,MAE.TICKET_NO_END,MAE.system_partner,MAE.gmt_trade_create, MC.BILL_NO ,MC.AMOUNT ,MC.TRANS_ACCOUNT_OUT ,MC.TRANS_ACCOUNT_IN ,MC.CUSTOMER_ID ,MC.BIZ_NAME ,MC.OPERATOR_ID ,MC.OPERATOR_NAME ,MC.MEMO ,MC.credit_available_amount, BTB.goods_title,BTB.out_trade_no,BTB.trade_email
from mcenter_account_log MAL left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on MAL.real_trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# left join trade_base BTB on MAL.real_trade_no = BTB.trade_no AND BTB.owner IN #owner[]# left join mcenter_creditpay MC on MAL.real_trade_no = MC.trade_no AND MC.owner IN #owner[]# WHERE
order by TRANS_DT DESC,IW_ACCOUNT_LOG_ID DESC

operation.name: findAccountLogWithAirExt
operation.sql:
SELECT IW_ACCOUNT_LOG_ID,TRANS_LOG_ID,MAL.TRANS_DATE,MAL.OUT_DATE,MAL.TRANS_DT,MAL.TRANS_CODE,MAL.TRANS_AMOUNT,MAL.BALANCE,MAL.TRANS_CURRENCY,MAL.ACCOUNT_TYPE,MAL.TRANS_ACCOUNT,OTHER_ACCOUNT_TYPE,OTHER_ACCOUNT,TRANS_INSTITUTION,TRANS_OUT_ORDER_NO,BANK_NAME,TRANS_MEMO,SUB_TRANS_CODE,OUT_BIZ_NO,MODEL,SUITE_ID,IS_WRITE_OFF,IS_RED,OTHER_ACCOUNT_LOG,DELETE_FLAG,VOUCHER_ID,ORGI_VOUCHER_ID,TRANS_OPERATOR,INST_CHANNEL_API,REAL_TRADE_NO,PAY_TYPE,MAL.VAR2 specialOutTradeNo, , MAE.PNR,MAE.TICKET_NO_START,MAE.TICKET_NO_END,MAE.system_partner,MAE.gmt_trade_create, BTB.goods_title,BTB.out_trade_no,BTB.trade_email
from mcenter_account_log MAL left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on MAL.real_trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# left join trade_base BTB on MAL.real_trade_no = BTB.trade_no AND BTB.owner IN #owner[]# WHERE
order by TRANS_DT DESC,IW_ACCOUNT_LOG_ID DESC

operation.name: countAndSumAccountInfo
operation.sql: SELECT count(*) count,sum(TRANS_AMOUNT) sumTransAmount from mcenter_account_log MAL left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on MAL.real_trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# left join trade_base BTB on MAL.real_trade_no = BTB.trade_no AND BTB.owner IN #owner[]# WHERE

operation.name: countByCondition
operation.sql: select count(*) from mcenter_account_log where owner IN #owner[]# AND trans_dt >= #startDate# AND trans_dt < #endDate# AND trans_account = #account#

operation.name: summaryAcccountLogByDay
operation.sql:
select trans_date, count(trans_account) as total_count, , sum(case when (trans_amount > 0) then trans_amount end) as income, sum(case when (trans_amount < 0) then trans_amount end) as outcome from mcenter_account_log where owner IN #owner[]# and trans_dt >= #transDtBegin# and trans_dt < #transDtEnd# and sub_trans_code != '301118' group by trans_date, air_biz_type
having air_biz_type in #airBizTypeList[]#
order by trans_date desc , air_biz_type asc

operation.name: summaryAcccountLogByRange
operation.remarks: 账务汇总查询(按时间段)
operation.sql:
select count(trans_account) as total_count, , sum(case when (trans_amount > 0) then trans_amount end) as income, sum(case when (trans_amount < 0) then trans_amount end) as outcome from mcenter_account_log where owner IN #owner[]# and trans_dt >= #transDtBegin# and trans_dt < #transDtEnd# and sub_trans_code != '301118' group by air_biz_type
having air_biz_type in #airBizTypeList[]#
order by air_biz_type asc

operation.name: summaryAcccountLogByPartner
operation.sql:
select trade_email, count(trans_account) as total_count, , sum(case when (trans_amount > 0) then trans_amount end) as income, sum(case when (trans_amount < 0) then trans_amount end) as outcome from mcenter_account_log MAL left join trade_base BTB on MAL.real_trade_no = BTB.trade_no AND BTB.owner IN #owner[]# where MAL.owner IN #owner[]# and trans_dt >= #transDtBegin# and trans_dt < #transDtEnd# and sub_trans_code != '301118' group by BTB.trade_email,air_biz_type
having air_biz_type in #airBizTypeList[]#
order by air_biz_type asc

operation.name: summaryAcccountLogByPartnerAndDay
operation.remarks: 平台商汇总明细查询(按天)
operation.sql:
select trans_date,BTB.trade_email, count(trans_account) as total_count, , sum(case when (trans_amount > 0) then trans_amount end) as income, sum(case when (trans_amount < 0) then trans_amount end) as outcome from mcenter_account_log MAL left join trade_base BTB on MAL.real_trade_no = BTB.trade_no AND BTB.owner IN #owner[]# where MAL.owner IN #owner[]# and trans_dt >= #transDtBegin# and trans_dt < #transDtEnd# and sub_trans_code != '301118' group by trans_date,BTB.trade_email,air_biz_type
having air_biz_type in #airBizTypeList[]#
order by trans_date desc

operation.name: summaryAcccountLogByPartnerAndRange
operation.remarks: 平台商汇总明细查询(按时间段)
operation.sql:
select BTB.trade_email, count(trans_account) as total_count, , sum(case when (trans_amount > 0) then trans_amount end) as income, sum(case when (trans_amount < 0) then trans_amount end) as outcome from mcenter_account_log MAL left join trade_base BTB on MAL.real_trade_no = BTB.trade_no AND BTB.owner IN #owner[]# where MAL.owner IN #owner[]# and trans_dt >= #transDtBegin# and trans_dt < #transDtEnd# and sub_trans_code != '301118' group by BTB.trade_email, air_biz_type
having air_biz_type in #airBizTypeList[]#
order by air_biz_type asc
